examples.example: 平时我会抽时间阅读书籍来丰富自己的知识。

translate.english: Usually I will take time to read books to enrich my knowledge.

examples.example: 平时我都会积极参加各种公益活动，为社会贡献自己的一份力量。

translate.english: Usually I will actively participate in various public welfare activities and contribute my own strength to the society.

examples.example: 平时我总是以乐观的心态面对生活中的各种挑战。

translate.english: Usually I always face all kinds of challenges in life with an optimistic attitude.
